data.title: Gerald Rudolff Ford Sr (1890-1962)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Gerald Ford Sr born 1890 Grand Rapids, Kent, Michigan, United States died 1962 Grand Rapids, Kent, Michigan, United States including ancestors + children + 2 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors

[sibling(s) unknown]

Profile last modified 2 Mar 2020 | Created 3 Jan 2011

This page has been accessed 3,967 times.

Biography

Stepfather of US President Gerald Ford, 38th President of the United States

"Gerald Ford, Sr., married Dorothy King nee Gardner, the President's mother, after her divorce from Leslie L King, the President's biological father. Gerald Ford, Sr., never formally adopted the future President, although some media refer to him as the President's adoptive father. Gerald Ford, Jr., was born Leslie Lynch King, Jr. on 14 July 1913. His parents separated when he was just two weeks old. In 1916, Gerald Ford's mother Dorothy remarried to Gerald R. Ford, a Grand Rapids, Michigan paint salesman. The Fords began calling Dorothy's son Gerald R. Ford, Jr., although his name was not legally changed until 1935."

2 January 1920: Grand Rapids Ward 3, Kent, Michigan; Gerald R Ford Head of Household 30 Michigan/Ohio/Michigan; Dorothy G Ford Wife 28 Illinois/Ohio/Illinois; 'Gerald R Ford Jr. Son 6 Nebraska; Thos G Ford Son 1 Michigan; https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MZ31-WTZ

Find A Grave: Memorial #14686534 Gerald Rudolff Ford

Sources
